headline: Texas Instruments Incorporated (TXN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Texas Instruments Incorporated on Best Anchor Stocks’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TXN. Texas Instruments Incorporated’s share was trading at $225.01 as of February 2nd. TXN’s trailing and forward P/E were 41.29 and 33.56 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
